snippet: After Jim Johnson blew a two-run lead in the bottom of the ninth inning, the Baltimore Orioles gave him another shot in the 10th.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles defeat Boston Red Sox, 8-6, in overtime; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: After Jim Johnson blew a two-run lead in the bottom of the ninth inning, the Baltimore Orioles gave him another shot in the 10th.

headline.seo: Lasorda Hospitalized After Having ‘Mild’ Heart Attack
headline.main: Johnson Gets Win, Not Save, as Orioles Top Red Sox in 10
headline.print_headline: Johnson Gets Win, Not Save, As Orioles Top Red Sox in 10
